about_the_game:
This is a single player performance test demo for Hush: In Search of Dominic Ward. This short demo is intended to allow players to evaluate the performance requirements of the game, and to determine if their VR system is capable of running it. In this demo you take on the roles of Sam and their closest friend as they try to unravel the mystery of what has become of Dominic Ward (Sam's Uncle). The demo contains no puzzles. It includes a split scene with 2 rooms that introduce the characters and an intro cinematic sequence. The goal is to get the player interested in the world and story of the game.

Unlike this demo, the main game Hush: In Search of Dominic Ward is a required co-op game. Please see the main store page for a more detailed description.

content_descriptors.notes: The player is served wine and subsequently drugged in a cinematic sequence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
